He teaches on the the Data Science Apprenticeship in the Faculty of Science and is the Faculty Director for Higher and Degree Apprenticeships. Before joining the University of Nottingham, he worked at Brunel University London where he was Director of Learning and Teaching in the Department of Computer Science. Before becoming an academic, Simon also worked a Senior Consultant and Software Architect in the Financial Services Industry in London and Continental Europe. Expertise SummarySimon's current focus is on Innovation in Learning and Teaching. This includes the use of technology in education.
